title: 308 -  10 of My Favorite Creative Podcasts & The 10 Super Insights They Taught Me PART 1
description:
Listen & Subscribe on Apple Podcasts
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/creative-pep-talk/id929743897

Get Episode Transcripts at creative-pep-talk.simplecast.com

- - -
SHOW NOTES
- - -

Co-Loop Podcast Network - co-podcast.co

Art For Your Ear by The Jealous Curator - Wayne White
https://www.thejealouscurator.com/blog/2020/05/08/fishin-with-santa-claus-in-heaven/

Small Doses with Amanda Seales - Side Effects of Creative Process
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/side-effects-of-the-creative-process/id1333316223?i=1000454644492

The Wandering Wolf with Yoni Wolf - Hop Along
http://www.thewanderingwolfpodcast.com/?p=437

Good One Podcast by Vulture hosted by Jesse David Fox - Sinbad
https://www.vulture.com/news/good-one-podcast/

Sit There and Do Nothing with Meg Lewis - Scatman
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/1994-hit-scatman-ski-ba-bop-ba-dop-bop/id1493559054?i=1000486947375

- - -
SPONSORS
- - -

STORYBLOCKS
Video is one of my most effective ways to stand out as a creator online these days - and with Storyblocks you can take your videos to the next level - with Affordable Subscriptions, Unlimited Downloads, and 1M+ Royalty Free Assets - you can level up your content at storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk

 

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE! 

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to skillshare.com/creativepep to get started!!!

 

SHILLINGTON 
Study 9 months part-time Graphic Design Boot Camp from anywhere. With Shillington’s online graphic design course, you’ll graduate with a solid understanding of creative problem solving, design theory and software. Create an incredible design portfolio and master how to discuss and sell your work—essential skills for any creative career. LEARN MORE: https://shillo.online/creativepeptalk
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Andy J. Pizza, Co-Loop Podcast Network)

itunes:title: 308 -  10 of My Favorite Creative Podcasts & The 10 Super Insights They Taught Me PART 1
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza, Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
Listen in and hear some of my all time favorite creative podcasts, specific episodes of theirs I love and even specific tips, tactics and mindset shifts from these episodes! These insights have been SUPERCHARGING my creativity lately.

OK! HUGE NEWS!! We just launched our very own CREATIVE PODCAST NETWORK!!! The Co-Loop Podcast Network is NOW LIVE: co-podcast.co

What podcasts inspire you? This is the question I get maybe more than any other. SO! I’ve decided to answer this question in a BIG WAY. First by creating a directory of my favorite shows by launching our very own podcast network! 

And secondly by creating a two part episode where we discuss the 5 podcasts we chose to be part of our network and 5 other shows that aren’t on the network but incredibly inspiring anyway! 

Part TWO will drop tomorrow!

itunes:keywords: podcast network, creativity, art for your ear, amanda seales, wandering wolf, podcast, jesse david fox, creative, sit there and do nothing, good one, jealous curator, meg lewis, motivation, small doses, wayne white
